snippet.title: Happy 20th b-day, Game Boy: here are 6 reasons why you're #1
snippet.description: ...Twenty years ago this week, Nintendo released the Game Boy, its first handheld video game console. Excited Japanese customers snatched up the innovative monochrome handheld by the thousands, which retailed for 12,500 yen (about $94 at 1989 rates) at launcha small price to pay for what seemed to be an NES in your pocket. Nintendo initially offered four games for the new Game Boy: Super Mario Land,...

snippet.title: A Boy and His Blob revealed for Nintendo Wii
snippet.description: ...Many gamers have fond memories of the odd friendship between a boy and his blob in... well, A Boy and His Blob. The David Crane-designed Game Boy title had you, the boy, feeding different-flavored jelly beans to change your blob into different forms to solve puzzles. Nintendo Power has revealed that the game is getting a makeover for the Nintendo Wii, care of Majesco.You can take a look at two pa...

snippet.title: Indie filmakers tackle indie games in Indie Game: The Movie
snippet.description: ...It's sometimes easy to forget that games are made by people. Game developers... associate specific designers with specific games. The aptly titled feature documentary Indie Game: The Movie is looking to change that by telling the stories of some of the most acclaimed indie games...
